carrotaws:secure-shell-publish

Full name:

com.carrotgarden.maven:carrot-maven-aws-plugin:1.1.3-SNAPSHOT:secure-shell-publish

Description:

publish directory content via sftp from local to remote system

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: prepare-package.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
amazonRegion String - AWS region name, such as us-east-1, which controls amazon region selection;
Default value is: us-east-1.
sshConnectRetries int - How many times to attempt to retry ssh connection before giving up
Default value is: 5.
sshConnectTimeout int - How long (in seconds) to wait if a ssh connection fails before retrying
Default value is: 10.
sshHost String - ssh host name
Default value is: builder.example.com.
sshKeyFile File - ssh key file
Default value is: ${user.home}/.amazon/ssh-key.pem.
sshSource String - ssh sftp source directory on local file system
Default value is: ./target/publish.
sshStatusSuccess Set - ssh run expected exit success status collection; such as
sshTarget String - ssh sftp target directory on remote file system
Default value is: /tmp/publish.
sshUser String - ssh user name
Default value is: ubuntu.
stackPropertiesOutputFile File - AWS CloudFormation stack create execution result Outputs Section output properties file - used to substitute ssHost
Default value is: ./target/formation/formation-output.properties.

Parameter Details

amazonRegion:

AWS region name, such as us-east-1, which controls amazon region selection;
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: us-east-1

sshConnectRetries:

How many times to attempt to retry ssh connection before giving up
  • Type: int
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: 5

sshConnectTimeout:

How long (in seconds) to wait if a ssh connection fails before retrying
  • Type: int
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: 10

sshHost:

ssh host name
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: builder.example.com

sshKeyFile:

ssh key file
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${user.home}/.amazon/ssh-key.pem

sshSource:

ssh sftp source directory on local file system
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ./target/publish

sshStatusSuccess:

ssh run expected exit success status collection; such as
  • Type: java.util.Set
  • Required: Yes

sshTarget:

ssh sftp target directory on remote file system
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: /tmp/publish

sshUser:

ssh user name
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ubuntu

stackPropertiesOutputFile:

AWS CloudFormation stack create execution result Outputs Section output properties file - used to substitute ssHost
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ./target/formation/formation-output.properties
